FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.heading: Common Questions
FAQ.q1: How can I manage my property on MyBnb?
FAQ.a1: Simply sign up, provide, your details, property details, set pricing, and publish your listing.
FAQ.a2: We charge a small duration servicefee and you have accessto al our apps features.
FAQ.q3: How do I pay for subscription?
FAQ.a3: Payments are processed securely using your preferred payment method.
FAQ.q4: What happens if i want to cancels my subsription?
FAQ.a4: Our flexible cancellation policies allow you to cancel subscription easily and effortlessly.
FAQ.a5: Yes, we support bussiness properties and travelers worldwide!

Features.title: Features

Features.f6_desc: We prioritize safety with verified guests, secure transactions, and fraud protection.
